Name: Scorched Earth
Ingredients: 15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry, very aromatic and bordering on bitter. Interesting but not to everybody's taste. The lemon zest twist makes this cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2006 by Nicholas Hearin at Restaurant Eugene in Atlanta, USA, and first published by Gary "gaz" Regan .
Nutrition: One serving of Scorched Earth contains 148 calories
